scripts.coverage: nyc --report html --reporter lcov --reporter text-summary mocha test
scripts.codeclimate: (test -e .codeclimate && npm run coverage && source .codeclimate && codeclimate-test-reporter < coverage/lcov.info) || echo skipping codeclimate
scripts.examples: node examples/callback-example && node examples/promise-example && node examples/synchronous-example

hooks.pre-commit: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run examples
hooks.pre-push: npm run lint && npm run codeclimate
